enter_business_name_page_title: [CY]What is the name of the business?[CY]
enter_business_name_page_title_info: [CY]If you're a sole trader, you should give your own name if you do not have a different business name that you trade under.[CY]

enter_business_name_validation_errors.BUSINESS_NAME_LENGTH: [CY]Business name must be 80 characters or less[CY]
enter_business_name_validation_errors.BUSINESS_NAME_INVALID_CHARACTER: [CY]Business name must contain only valid characters[CY]
